description:
A set of useful items that you would usually have to wait to acquire later in the game.

Featured items:
- Reflection Talisman
- Carapace Talisman
- Healing Talisman
- Traveler's Shoes (exploration equipment that increases movement speed)
- Victor's Charm (increases the amount of Cole earned after a battle by 4%)
- Training Charm (increases the amount of EXP gained after a battle by 10%)

Note: The DLC items can be obtained from the Container in the atelier.
Talismans can only be used after you progressed the game to the point where you can change your equipment.
Please visit the official website for more information.
This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".
name: Useful Items Set
